descriptionShipDestroyer:
Ship Destroyer is a mobile game for Android devices in which you can fight against enemy ships and destroy them with your cannons. You will also be able to choose between 6 different ships, each with their own special abilities!

     This game took about 3 months to be developed. In this project I worked with implementation of In-App-Purchase and AdMob system as well!
descriptionABeastOutside: A Beast Outside is a game was done for a Game Jam, with theme of game Horror and Feral Beast. It was my first game for a Game Jam in which my game came in fourth place out of 25 participants!
descriptionFPSMultiplayer: This is a shooter multiplayer game in first person made with Photon Pun for the purpose of learning the tool!
aboutmedescriptionP:
I have 30 years old and I am a Unity Developer from Brazil. I started game development in January 2022 and I always seek to improve my knowledge in the area, being self-taught, studying and learning on my own in order to improve my development and programming skills.

     I consider myself a person who is passionate about games, from the oldest games to the most current ones. I've been a very creative person since I was a child and I really like the idea of being able to create new interactive worlds and have this interaction between people and the digital world.

     At the moment I have been learning how to develop multiplayer games using Photon Pun and Mirror Networking, and in the future I intend to start learning game development in VR and AR too. In September 2023 I started learning Front-End to build this portfolio and have my projects combined with my own identity.

aboutmedescriptionP:
Tenho 30 anos e sou Desenvolvedor Unity de São João de Meriti - RJ. Iniciei no desenvolvimento de jogos em Janeiro de 2022 e busco sempre melhorar meus conhecimentos na área, sendo autodidata, estudando e aprendendo por conta própria a fim de melhorar minhas habilidades de desenvolvimento e programação.

     Me considero uma pessoa apaixonada por jogos, desde os jogos mais antigos até os mais atuais. Sou uma pessoa muito criativa desde criança e gosto muito da ideia de poder criar novos mundos interativos e ter essa interação entre pessoas e o mundo digital.

     No momento tenho aprendido a desenvolver jogos multiplayer usando Photon Pune Mirror Networking, e no futuro pretendo começar a aprender desenvolvimento de jogos em VR e AR também. Em Setembro de 2023 comecei a aprender Front-End para construir esse portfólio e ter meus projetos reunidos com minha própria identidade.
